instructions.para: Use syntax encoding scheme for describing video segments.
Syntax encoding scheme: segment number. Time-based information. Description. Related resource.
Use syntax encoding scheme for describing video segments.
Syntax encoding scheme: segment number. Time-based information. Description. Related resource. [Separate multiple segments with double-dash.]

example.para: Segment 1: 0:00:01-0:02:14. Celebrants dance Tsifteteli with musicians from Flambouro and Anthi: Yiannis Barbas, Christos Meros, Christos Karakostas, zournas, and Yiorgos Yioryiou and Dionysis Fotiou on daouli; Yiannis Metos is not seen but is also playing. See Yvonne Hunt's book A Nest of Gold, 412-413. --Segment 2: 0:02:15.-0:03:06. The music changes to 7/8 rhythm; Karakostas plays while workers dance inside the taverna.

Segment 1: 0:00:01-0:02:14. Celebrants dance Tsifteteli with musicians from Flambouro and Anthi: Yiannis Barbas, Christos Meros, Christos Karakostas, zournas, and Yiorgos Yioryiou and Dionysis Fotiou on daouli; Yiannis Metos is not seen but is also playing. See See Yvonne Hunt's book A Nest of Gold, 412-413. --Segment 2: 0:02:15.-0:03:06. The music changes to 7/8 rhythm; Karakostas plays while workers dance inside the taverna.

history.justification: Needed to describe video segments using descriptions provided by Yvonne Hunt.
